subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Mark Cavendish, a Briton racing for the HTC-Highroad team, won a stage marred by spills after his frustrating start to the Tour de France.
snippet: Mark Cavendish, a Briton racing for the HTC-Highroad team, won a stage marred by spills after his frustrating start to the Tour de France.
